title: FIVB- 2020
text: Other beach volleyball Olympians celebrating birthdays this week are Lina Yanchulova of Bulgaria (45, 2000 and 2004 Olympics) on Sunday, Riccardo Lione of Italy (48, 2008) on Monday, Debora Schoon Kadijk of the Netherlands (51, 1996, and 2000), Danja Musch of Germany (49, 1996, 2000 and 2004) and Benjamin Insfran of Brazil (48, 2004) on Tuesday, Raul Mesa of Spain (38, 2008) on Thursday and Lenka Hajeckova of the Czech Republic (42, 2012) on Friday. Of this group, Benjamin ranks among the FIVB leaders in gold medals (13) and podium placements (33) as he played on the World Tour for 16 seasons (1997-2012) with 152 events played.
